data.title: THE MARRIED MAN by Robert Nathan: Very Good + Hardcover (1962) First edition, as stated.
data.meta_description: First edition, as stated. - Hardcover - Alfred A. Knopf, New York - 1962 - Condition: Very Good + - good + - 6 x 9 in. Cloth boards. Condition is VERY GOOD+ ; minimal wear, covers very clean. Binding tight and text unmarked. DJ is GOOD+ ; clipped, unevenly toned. Poet. Stax. - THE MARRIED MAN
data.text:
Terms of Sale:

All subject to prior sale. Maine residents

pay 5% sales tax. Payment accepted by check, money order,

Visa/Mastercard/American

Express

and Paypal. Payment expected within 7 days. Customer pays shipping charges.

Contact info:

Andre Strong

PO box 1300

Blue Hill ME 04614

USA

andrestrongbooks@gmail.com

Shipping Terms:

Orders usually ship within 2 business days. Shipping costs are based on books

weighing 2.2 LB, or 1 KG. If your book order is heavy or oversized, we may contact

you to let you know extra shipping is required.
